entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Snow mixed with drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
